Class Game

java.lang.Object
fr.insa.IA.Game.Game

public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
A Game of our simplified Belote.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int nbPlayer)
      Constructor of Game.
      Parameters:
      nbPlayer - (int) number of players playing the game (AI and human).

  • Method Details

    • proceedGame

      public void proceedGame()
      Proceed the entire game looping and creating new rounds.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undo the last action / card played (Coup) played, and update consequently the players. Used by the AI.

    • next

      public void next(Carte carte, Round round)
      The current player plays the next action / card. Used by the AI.
      Parameters:
      carte - card to be played
      round - current round where the play will occur
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - should never occur

    • isOver

      public boolean isOver()
      Checks if the game is over by checking the hand and table size of the players.
      Returns:
      true if none of the players have cards to play.

    • getPlayers

      Returns:
      players

      Parameters:
      round - (Round) to be added
      See Also:
      • Round

    • getCurrentRound

      public Round getCurrentRound()
      Getter of the current round. The current round is the last element in rounds. The current round can either have 0, 1, or 2 cards played.
      Returns:
      the current round
      See Also:
      • Round

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Getter of the currentPlayer.
      Returns:
      player who is about to play

      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - (Player) : player who is about to play

      Returns:
      deck used in the game

    • getRounds

      public List<Round> getRounds()
      Getter of the rounds played. Watch out, the last one is the current round.
      Returns:
      List of rounds played
      See Also:
      • Round

    • payoff

      public double payoff(Player player)
      Used by the AI to evaluate its actions. Only used during the training of the AI.
      Parameters:
      player - (Player) controlled by the AI
      Returns:
      (double)
      See Also:
      • CFR

    • getGameInfoSet

      public InfoSet getGameInfoSet()
      Getter of the infoset at his current point in the game. An infoset contains all the known information : already played cards, cards in hand, opponent card in his table, ...
      Returns:
      (InfoSet) containing all the information

    • printGameState

      public void printGameState()
      UI to help the human player.
